full_summary:
=================

### Cancelled Tender Notice

#### Solicitation Number

*   **Solicitation Number (exacte)**: W8472-235886

#### Tender Information

*   **Title ( anglais)**: Cancelled-W8472-235886
*   **Title (français)**: Annulé-W8472-235886
*   **Reference Number**: PW-22-01013098
*   **Amendment Number**: 5
*   **Publication Date**: 2022-11-09
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-01-30
*   **Amendment Date**: 2023-01-20

#### Contract Information

*   **Tender Status (anglais)**: Cancelled
*   **Tender Status (français)**: Annulé

#### Description

*   **Trade Agreement (anglais)**: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
*   **Trade Agreement (français)**: Accord de libre-échange Canada-Corée, Accord de libre-échange Canada-Honduras, Accord de libre-échange Canada-Colombie, Accord économique et commercial global (AECG) entre le Canada et l’Union européenne (UE), Accord de Partenariat transpacifique global et progressiste (PTPGP), Accord sur les marchés publics de l'Organisation mondiale du commerce (AMP-OMC), Accord de libre-échange Canada-Pérou, Accord de libre-échange canadien.

#### Contact Information

*   **Contracting Entity (anglais)**: Department of National Defence, 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A0K2, Canada.
*   **Contracting Entity (français)**: Ministère de la défense nationale, 101, promenade Colonel By, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A0K2, Canada.
*   **End User (anglais)**: Department of National Defence, 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A0
